description:
It`s two stories in one! First, Hazuki`s radio-cassette player is broken. Can the crazy comedy duo Ryo and Fu help? Then, while out on a Sunday walk, Sora runs into a young girl with a camera. For some reason, the girl follows wherever Sora goes...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Radio-Cassette Player and Young Girl Double Feature
ラジカセと少女の二本立て
